703223f.text: Bergen Street, at the N.w. corner of Albany Avenue, showing a view of the Commercial High School. About 1928. Eugene L Armbruster Collection.
703223f.folder: Bergen Street & Albany Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

703222f-b.text:
1. Bergen Street, east from Albany Avenue. Note the old trolley barns on the left. March 29, 1932.

2. The same, at a later date. The car barns have been abandoned. September 12, 1940.

P. L. Sperr
703222f-b.folder: Bergen Street & Albany Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
